Class ClearRow

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.logic.movement.ClearRow
public final class ClearRow extends Object
Represents the result of clearing rows on the game board, including the number of lines removed, the new board matrix, any score bonus, and the indices of the cleared rows.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ClearRow(int linesRemoved, int[][] newMatrix, int scoreBonus, int[] clearedRows)
    Constructs a new ClearRow object.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int[]
    getClearedRows()
    Returns an array of the indices of the rows that were cleared.
    int
    getLinesRemoved()
    Returns the number of lines removed in this clear operation.
    int[][]
    getNewBoard()
    Returns a copy of the updated game board matrix after the rows have been cleared.
    int
    getScoreBonus()
    Returns the score bonus awarded for clearing the rows.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClearRow

      public ClearRow(int linesRemoved, int[][] newMatrix, int scoreBonus, int[] clearedRows)
      Constructs a new ClearRow object.
      Parameters:
      linesRemoved - The number of lines removed.
      newMatrix - The new game board matrix after clearing.
      scoreBonus - The score bonus gained from clearing lines.
      clearedRows - An array of the indices of the rows that were cleared.

  • Method Details

    • getLinesRemoved

      public int getLinesRemoved()
      Returns the number of lines removed in this clear operation.
      Returns:
      The number of lines removed.

    • getNewBoard

      public int[][] getNewBoard()
      Returns a copy of the updated game board matrix after the rows have been cleared.
      Returns:
      A 2D integer array representing the new game board matrix.

    • getScoreBonus

      public int getScoreBonus()
      Returns the score bonus awarded for clearing the rows.
      Returns:
      The score bonus.

    • getClearedRows

      public int[] getClearedRows()
      Returns an array of the indices of the rows that were cleared.
      Returns:
      An integer array containing the indices of the cleared rows.
